title: UEFA members back Platini in fight to clear name
text: Oct. 16, 2015 | 12:09 AM UEFA members back Platini in fight to clear name Infantino: “Let’s give Platini the chance to defend himself, to clear his name.” (Jean-Christophe Bott, Keystone via AP) Share Associated Press you've reached a subscriber-only article.
